content: 2 *k15 m1* repeat * to * four times there are now 64sts on your needles rounds 3-9 knit the colorwork chart using the mc and cc the chart is work six times total around the circumference of the sock at the end of round 10 cut the cc yarn the rest of the sock is knit in the mc round 10 k8 k2tog k14 k2tog* three times total knit until the end of the round you are now back to 60sts on your needles this is a good moment to try slipping the cuff over your foot to make sure that your colorwork is loose enough to fit over your heel 3 january socks by allison rose short row german short row are now worked to raise the back heel of the foot this short row section of the pattern will only work the first 30sts i e the stitches on your first needle video tutorial for german short row row 1 rs knit until three stitches are left on your first needle i e knit 27sts gsr turn row 2 ws purl until three stitches are left on your needle gsr turn row 3 rs knit until three stitches before the double stitch you have three regular stitches on your left needle and then the double stitch gsr turn row 4 ws purl until three stitches before the double stitch you have three regular stitches on your left needle and then the double stitch gsr turn repeat row 3&4 one more time after you have finished row 4 the final time continue knitting to the end of the needle knitting the double stitches together as one stitch as you go then rejoin with the second needle and knit to the end of the row knit one more full round knitting the double stitches together as you come across them heel flap we will now make the heel flap for our heel flap and gusset heel construction this version of the heel flap has three stitches of garter stitches on either side which creates a very neat edge and makes it easier to later pick up stitches like the short row the heel flap and heel turn sections are only worked over the first 30 stitches i e the stitches on your first needle row 1 rs k3 *sl1wyib k1* repeat * to * until there are three stitches left on your first needle k3 turn your work row 2 ws k3 purl until there are three stitches left k3 repeat row 1&2 14 more times 15 times total heel turn this heel is made using a french heel turn note the turns in this section are not german short row turns row 1 rs sl1wyib k16 ssk k1 turn your work row 2 ws sl1wyif p5 p2tog p1 turn your work row 3 rs sl1wyib knit until one stitch before the gap ssk k1 turn your work row 4 ws sl1wyif purl until one stitch before the gap
